alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:36PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Seminole, east central Lake, northwestern Brevard, eastern Orange and southeastern Volusia Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 536 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Canaveral Groves, or near Lone Cabbage Fish Camp, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Deltona, Sanford, Titusville, and Altamonte Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
